name: Thysiastery
summary: Thysiastery is a dungeon crawler RPG featuring traditional roguelike and turn-based gameplay. Command a party of bearers of the Brand, drawn into a vast Labyrinth. Recruit while exploring the Labyrinth in hope of finding a way out, and its secrets will be revealed as you delve deeper.

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: THYSIASTERY TRAILER - PLAY DEMO ON STEAM!
